name: FUNGUS!
description:
You are a Ground Troll, a simple being with a simple life thrust into a not-so-simple quest. A quest to find breakfast!

Embark on a hilarious journey, collect shiny pebbles, meet quirky characters, and generally have a grand old time. Can you find all 4 endings?

-------

This is my first venture into using Twine (and game design in general), so any feedback would be greatly appreciated :)
